item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: New OS SKU enum to migrate to Azure Linux 3.0
item.description:
Azure now provides a new OS SKU enum, ‘AzureLinux3’, that lets you migrate to Azure Linux 3.0 for clusters running Kubernetes versions 1.28â€“1.36. The option gives increased control over OS upgrades by decoupling them from Kubernetes upgrades.

  • Source: Azure Updates
